install.description: Joomla! DOM X-Ray is a Joomla 1.6 DOM scanning/debugging tool. It is installed as a plugin and is triggered by Joomla "onBeforeRender". It works almost similar to CSSEdit's X-Ray but it doesn't show the location of the Element Identifiers in the CSS files using the data contained here http://rc.hrpr.com/j16.
